inputs.name: prompt
inputs.description: The prompt to feed to the model.

inputs.name: max_new_tokens
inputs.description: Generate at most this many new tokens in the response.

output.outputs:
<s> Tell me about AI
    
Artificial intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems. These processes include learning, reasoning, perception, and decision-making. AI systems can be designed to perform a wide range of tasks, from simple decision-making processes to complex tasks that require human-like intelligence.

AI has been around for decades, but recent advancements in technology have made it more accessible and powerful than ever before. Today, AI is being used in a variety of industries, including healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and transportation.

One of the most exciting applications of AI is in the field of robotics. Robots are becoming increasingly sophisticated and are being used to perform a wide range of tasks, from manufacturing to healthcare. AI-powered robots can learn from their experiences and adapt to new situations, making them more efficient and effective over time.

Another area where AI is making a big impact is in the field of natural language processing. AI systems can now understand and respond to human language in a way that was once thought impossible. This technology is being used in chatbots, virtual assistants, and other applications that require human-like communication.

AI is also being used in the field of machine learning, which involves training machines to learn from data and make predictions based on that data. This technology is being used in a variety of applications, including fraud detection, image recognition, and predictive maintenance.

Overall, AI has the potential to revolutionize many industries and improve our lives in countless ways. As the technology continues to advance, we can expect to see even more exciting applications of AI in the years to come.</s>
